fields.description:
{html}

Here's an app.js for a fail case: https://gist.github.com/d116232ef3ba72a4d26e I'm able to enter the field, get the keyboard and enter text. BTW, TextArea is okay.

comments.body:
Bug Scrub: Valid. No test Case exists (Used Provided Code)

Tested On: 
Mac OSX Lion 
TiMob Version: 1.7.2 
TiStud Version: 1.0.2 

Devices used: 
iPhone 4.2.10

Verified fixed with :
Mobile sdk-2.2.0.v20120810080115
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207271312
Device:
iPhone 4
Ipad 5.1

This was fixed in release 2.2.0, which means the fix is available off the 3.0.0 and master CI builds. This is not fixed in the 2_1_X branch so it is not fixed in the 2.1.3 GA release. And yes I have verified that this is indeed fixed in 3_0_X and master branches.
